text: wegaya padama sigrathawaya kiyala wenas karala.

thawamath pramada natha...

purushaya wisin ohuge wam danahisa nawima arambaanuye, anda wethin ohuge danahisa osawanne nathiwaya.ee wenuwata, ohu wisin ohuge wam danahisa eya nawena witama pitathata lissa yawamin, ohuge wam athulu kalawaya siwilima desata harawayi.

mema bandumkara wanchawen rupiyal biliyana 10 kata adhika mudalak rajayata ahimi wi athayi ki nishantha warnasinha mahatha mema wishala mudal sambharaya yali pawara ganimata rajaya katayuthu kala yuthu bawa da yahapalana aanduwe apakirthimathma siddhiya mema bandumkara wanchawa bawa da kiweya.

klintan wenuwen kriyakala ema kamituwa 2016 janadhipathiwaranaye apekshaka dhuraya laba ganime tharagayedi barni sandars ge prayathnaya kada kappal kirimata katayuthukala bawath, klintan wol widiye mulya lokkan amatha kala rahas deshana waladi owun ge awashyatha aaraksha karana bawata sapatha kala bawath mema eemel walin elidaraw wiya. 2017 mayi masayedi swidan baladharin asanjta erehiwa “parikshanaya” ahosi karamin yuropiya athadanguwata ganime warenthuwa awalangu karana ladi.

chunsuk rajuge palamu yuwan manaliya wu esen themurge (也先帖木兒) diyaniya saha kublayi khange minipiriya wu bukguk kumariya (복국장공주) 1319di miyagiya heyin dewana manaliya lesa joguk kumariya wiwaha karaganna ladi. ↑ 1349di gonmin raju wisin wiwaha karaganune mul yuwan manaliya syungyuyi kumariya (승의공주) nawatha pamini wigasayi. ↑ li je-hyon (이제현) saha pak wanshaye suchonguk aaryawage (수춘국부인 박씨) diyaniyayi. ↑ 1359 aprel 24 dina gonmin samaga wiwaha wiya. ↑ 9.0 9.1 9.2 gonmin rajuge upabisowarun thidenaku gonmin rajuge samalingika aarakshakayan dedenaku wu han aan (한안) saha hon ryun (홍륜) samaga rahas sambandhayak pawathwu bawata sakapita maligayen nerapana ladi. ↑ josonhi thejon rajuge 8wana warshaye aya miya giya ya.
